monsters.name: Special Forces Operative
monsters.description: An elite soldier with cutting-edge training and equipment.

specialAbilities.name: Tactical Training
specialAbilities.description: Has advantage on initiative rolls and cannot be surprised.

specialAbilities.name: Evasion
specialAbilities.description: Takes no damage on successful DEX save, half on failure.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes two rifle attacks or three knife attacks per turn.

specialAbilities.name: Flashbang
specialAbilities.description: Throws flashbang grenade (15-foot radius, DC 17 CON save or blinded/deafened for 2 turns).

flavorText: A laser sight appears on your chest - professional killer!
Silent and deadly, the operative strikes from the shadows!
Military precision meets lethal force!
monsters.defeatedText: The operative's mission ends in failure as they fall.

monsters.name: Combat Drone
monsters.description: An armed aerial drone with advanced targeting systems.

attacks.name: Missile
attacks.description: Guided missile strikes! (20-foot radius, DC 18 DEX save for half)

specialAbilities.name: Aerial Mobility
specialAbilities.description: Can fly. Ranged attacks against it have disadvantage.

specialAbilities.name: Thermal Imaging
specialAbilities.description: Can see invisible creatures and has advantage on Perception checks.

specialAbilities.name: Self-Destruct
specialAbilities.description: When reduced to 0 HP, explodes (15-foot radius, 6d8 fire damage, DC 17 DEX save for half).

flavorText: A whirring sound overhead - an armed drone!
Targeting systems lock on - drone attack imminent!
The future of warfare descends from the sky!
monsters.defeatedText: The drone spirals from the sky, systems failing.

monsters.name: Cyborg Enforcer
monsters.description: A human enhanced with extensive cybernetic implants.

attacks.name: Arm Cannon
attacks.description: Energy weapon built into cybernetic arm!

specialAbilities.name: Cybernetic Enhancements
specialAbilities.description: Has darkvision 120 ft, advantage on STR and CON saves, immune to poison and disease.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes two arm cannon or three fist attacks per turn.

specialAbilities.name: Adaptive Armor
specialAbilities.description: After taking damage of a type, gains resistance to it until end of next turn.

specialAbilities.name: Combat Stims
specialAbilities.description: Once per combat, heals 60 HP and gains +5 to all rolls for 3 turns.

flavorText: More machine than human, the cyborg advances!
Hydraulics hiss as cybernetic systems activate!
The line between man and machine has been crossed!
monsters.defeatedText: The cyborg's systems fail with a shower of sparks.

monsters.name: Bioweapon Subject
monsters.description: A human mutated by experimental biological weapons.

attacks.name: Toxic Bite
attacks.description: Disease-ridden fangs! (DC 18 CON save or poisoned and take 2d8 poison damage per turn)

specialAbilities.name: Regeneration
specialAbilities.description: Regains 15 HP at start of turn if has at least 1 HP.

specialAbilities.name: Multiattack
specialAbilities.description: Makes one bite and two claw attacks.

specialAbilities.name: Adaptive Evolution
specialAbilities.description: After taking damage of a type, gains resistance to it.

specialAbilities.name: Viral Spores
specialAbilities.description: Releases spores (20-foot radius, DC 18 CON save or 5d8 poison damage and infected).

flavorText: A twisted abomination lurches forward!
Flesh bubbles and shifts - science gone wrong!
What was once human is now a monster!
monsters.defeatedText: The mutant's unstable biology finally collapses.

monsters.name: Hacker Collective
monsters.description: A group of elite hackers operating sophisticated cyber warfare.

attacks.name: Taser
attacks.description: Electric shock! (DC 15 CON save or stunned for 1 turn)

specialAbilities.name: System Hack
specialAbilities.description: Can disable electronic devices, security systems, or cybernetics within 60 feet (DC 18 INT save to resist).

specialAbilities.name: Deploy Malware
specialAbilities.description: Target with cybernetics takes 4d10 psychic damage and has disadvantage on attacks for 3 turns.

specialAbilities.name: Countermeasures
specialAbilities.description: Has advantage on saves against technology-based attacks.

specialAbilities.name: Emergency Disconnect
specialAbilities.description: Can teleport to any computer system within 120 feet as reaction when hit.

flavorText: Screens flicker as the hackers breach your systems!
You're not fighting people - you're fighting code!
The digital battlefield is their domain!
monsters.defeatedText: The hackers' systems crash as they're disconnected.

monsters.name: SWAT Team
monsters.description: A heavily armed police tactical unit.

attacks.name: Coordinated Fire
attacks.description: Multiple officers fire simultaneously! (All targets in 30-foot cone)

attacks.name: Flashbang
attacks.description: Stun grenade! (15-foot radius, DC 16 CON save or blinded/deafened 2 turns)

specialAbilities.name: Team Tactics
specialAbilities.description: Represents 4-5 officers. Has advantage on attacks. Loses advantage below 90 HP.

specialAbilities.name: Breach and Clear
specialAbilities.description: Can move up to speed and ignore cover on attacks this turn.

specialAbilities.name: Shield Wall
specialAbilities.description: +2 AC when not moving.

flavorText: Breach! Breach! Breach! The SWAT team storms in!
Heavily armored officers take tactical positions!
Law enforcement's finest - fully armed and ready!
monsters.defeatedText: The tactical team falls, their coordinated assault broken.

monsters.name: Military Tank
monsters.description: A modern main battle tank with devastating firepower.

attacks.name: Main Cannon
attacks.description: High-explosive shell! (30-foot radius, DC 20 DEX save for half)

specialAbilities.name: Heavy Armor
specialAbilities.description: Resistance to all damage except force damage.

specialAbilities.name: Crush
specialAbilities.description: Can move through creatures' spaces. Creatures take 4d10 bludgeoning damage (DC 20 DEX save to avoid).

specialAbilities.name: Crew
specialAbilities.description: Requires crew to operate. If crew eliminated, tank is disabled.

flavorText: The ground shakes - a tank is approaching!
Armor plating and massive firepower combined!
Modern military might in steel form!
monsters.defeatedText: The tank explodes in a ball of flame, turret blown clear.
